title: Smoked fish pie
ingredients: ['For the filling', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 medium onions, sliced', '6 medium potatoes, diced', '300g (11 oz) frozen garden peas', '2 fillets salmon, diced', '2 fillets smoked haddock, diced', '150g (5 oz) smoked salmon, flaked', 'For the b√©chamel sauce', '25g butter', '1 tablespoon plain flour', '750ml (1 1/4 pints) milk', '150g (5 1/2 oz) Red Leicester or Cheddar cheese, grated', '1 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste', '1/2 teaspoon salt']
